lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello everyone and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whooping) And leading into that, our first sponsor tonight is our returning friends at D&D Beyond.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Our second sponsor tonight, (clears throat) as I prepare myself, is NordVPN. Sam.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's settle this the way all leet hackzors do, with a head-to-head hack off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, you're putting spyware on my aux interface? Try re-troglodyting the CD-ROM.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, you're trying to scramble my jumbotron? Yeah, good luck. It's password protected.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Damn it! (groans) No, you're gleaming my cube!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right, Black Willow, you're going down--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's, it's going to infect the whole world.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Which means we're going to have to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is the Ultra Codex, Matt? You don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do we have any time left to play D&D, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll try and squeeze it in.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, apparently the planet needs to be hacked.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Sam, thank you, Laura, and thank you, NordVPN for sponsoring us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, you were doing pretty good along with the tiny piano and the--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's only so much you can do with a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's only so much you can do with a bone flute.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think Frumpkin rolled the highest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When he's not killed in one hit. (laughs) So, after your loud performance display, thrashing the ears of the neighborhood, who had thought it calm and silent for oh so long in your absence--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What would you like to do with the evening? You're hungry, you're tired.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Essek isn't with us or anything, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You want food, you want to sleep? You're hungry, you're tired, whatta you want? (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've done our duty here, we don't have to hurry back to Rexxentrum, yeah? Do we?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, are we, are we meant to contact the Dwendal's people and tell them about the arrangement?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That will be the next thing and then probably getting the ship in order, I guess.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But there's no pressing, like, we don't have to do that today, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, the longer we wait, the more of a chance there is for something to slip and the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have to let them know right away to, like, hey, not fight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, yes, we do have to let them know right away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, so we should contact them now, tonight? Did I already do that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, we're so, I remember that, of course.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I say we have a leisurely evening, a leisurely morning, make our way back tomorrow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To deliver whatever other information we need to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You have armor to pick up here.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I forgot about that, but I have to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have to finish paying for it?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Finish paying for it, which I think, how much do I have left on it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Believe it was about 2,000 gold left on that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I just run it through you guys and you can tell me what's important on the to do list?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About five weeks, little over five weeks, maybe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we need costumes? Do we need anything, like, is there a uniform? I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Assuming our ship survives this treaty talks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Other things in my mental list to do list that's written down, Darrow, maybe scry on him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yeah, yeah, yeah, we could do that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because he's got a client that he won't tell us about!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And he won't tell us who it is, obviously.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could scry on him and find out who the client is and get useful intel or at least just fuck with him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pride Silk at Pride's Call for Keona?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that's kind of like a--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have to smuggle out the worms and then we could get paid a decent amount of money.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But the worms are real big and real sacred and they're real protective of them, so it'd be like a worm heist.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That seems like plenty of areas for us to fuck up--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There are Jagentoths in Shadycreek Run that exist.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, we kind of of knew that, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, but did we need to go and look it up or something?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did we want to murder them?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I send them a message and let them know that we're going to kill them?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Should we-- are we above, we've risen up in echelon in society, right, to not murder people without cause, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which society are you talking about? The Dynasty or the Empire?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are rather high profile everywhere now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are The Mighty Nein of--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Couple other, couple other options for us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Caduceus has some unfinished family business, I believe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I figured I would hit you all up for accompanying me to that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: On the way would be wonderful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And we need basilisk oil for Pumat Sol.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Those are the outstanding to do list items.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did he say where we were supposed to get that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is a really good list.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You need to stop by somewhere on, and where is it on our, if we're up in Xhorhas and we're going down?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll probably scry a bit more, but it's a little past, if I recall, if I--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's-- if you want to pull up a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A map of the Menagerie Coast, perhaps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Want to set them both out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How far down does the Xhorhas one go?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need the Coast, there it is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is where, (paper rustling) (feet scuffling) (chairs knocking) that is where you're thinking, the Whitedawn Lagoon, and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This would link approximately about there, in this vicinity.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I invent a Thomas guide?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was just laughing at that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I felt it, I felt it from you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So, the negotiation, the location where you had it agreed upon, which was between the Whitedawn Lagoon and Nicodranas--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which is just south of the border between Xhorhas and the Empire.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We could do that, I would appreciate that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not going to pretend I'm not a little nervous, but yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hit your place on the way down to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, someone starts knocking on the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a knock at the door.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, do we need to hide anything? Is anything out that's illegal?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to go to the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go ahead and peek through the curtain there in the front and you see behind it the familiar visage of Essek, the Shadowhand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I just, ah, "if you would have a guest for dinner, perhaps?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come on in, Essek, we invited you before! Come, come, come.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I hadn't really, you know, done something like this "in a while and perhaps it is-- "something I should do."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "Do I, do I believe him?" is what she wants to say.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does he have, do I believe him with an insight check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, make an insight check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is Solvia Groves Diamond Plum Wine."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He has do a little spin on the way over for a natural 20.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This whisper is brought to you by--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nothing can protect us from the dangers that abound in Wildemount, but--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I was like, "This isn't it." Also, that's very hard to say.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I was having a bad day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (clears throat) "My apologies." And you watch as he, after stepping into the chamber and handing off the bottle of wine, he (whoosh) stops hovering and lands on his feet and unfastens the mantle.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, we're going to see behind the curtain?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But no, he removes the mantle and sets it on one of the chairs in the foyer area of the Xhorhaus and he's dressed in a nice, comfortable clothes, well-trimmed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's actually not too different from your Xhorhasian outfit as you had it tailored, the design of which you requested is loosely based on similar designs you've seen around the city and his is more of a designer version of that, but comfortable and sleek in that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It just seems you're always gliding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "For me, it's more of a, (sighs) "I don't know. It's an expectation, I guess."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "When you're young and impetuous, "you tend to do things to try and impress people "and then once you've set a sort of expectation "for a presentation, you have to maintain it."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So people just expect you to float everywhere?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, walking makes you tired, if you think about it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, can you make anyone float? Or it's just yourself?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It still needs more time to aerate.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll have everything up and running real quick.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're in for a treat. Caduceus is quite a cook.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm very excited. Thank you very much."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have a dining room, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So are you single? Do you have kids? What's your last name?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's sit down and do some small talk first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It takes like an hour or two to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, my mother's name is "Deirta Thelyss, she is the Umavi of my den."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What was your last name again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "One of the multitude of dens. (chuckles) "Shall we sit?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Please, faint on this fainting couch.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we were just playing a concert for--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I was wondering what that sound was."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hey, it is not unlike some things "I've seen in Asarius."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So, what is the mood here in the Dynasty, here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A little bit of frustration in the halting of what was "to be a very successful raid on Rexxentrum."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "not entirely pleasant opinions of the opposing side."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My wonder what the dens, the various dens, think, the people here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There are numerous, and it depends "on which opinion you want."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Unfortunately, our most neighboring nation "tends to consider most everything to the east "savage landscapes and "dangerous cutthroats and "drow killers and everything else, so."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That has not been our experience here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But there are people on our end "and many folks who assume that the Empire "is nothing but a bunch of "money-crazed, murderous villagers ready to kill each other "for a scrap of meat."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But it seems you did as well, but circumstances "thrust us into spaces where we least expect."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What do you care for? What are, you know, your hobbies and things that you like to do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A cheese and vegetable plate comes out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The tension breaks when you set it down and he's like, "Thank you so much."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Main course coming, thank you, thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you need help in there, Caduceus?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll be, I'll be just a minute, I'm fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a "stay the fuck out of the kitchen."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wow, this is where Caduceus gets violent.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "what else it is pushes you forward?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Would it surprise you to know that perhaps a year ago, we didn't even know of a beacon or of the Dynasty or of any of this?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We knew of bacon, just not of a beacon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We all have individual goals and issues that we're working on, but--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I-- I've just had some, I'm not myself and haven't been for a while and was-- (sighs) like many of us, we're all searching for-- well, many of us are searching for who we are, but mine is much more odd because I know I'm not, I'm not supposed to be like this and I'm trying to change myself, physically.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So this is not your original form?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, seeing that people among you and her and some of the den leaders, I suppose, have changed form and shape many times over and put their spirits into other bodies.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They said that, when we were in there, that you had to be, what was the term again?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it take a long time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The ritual itself takes about a day."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The process of having to die to be consecuted "or returned to a new form, depending, "can be painful, I'm sure."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, they don't kill them once they're consecuted, "but when life comes to an end "and they are within a radial region of a beacon, "then the soul is taken by the beacon "and then implanted within a new life."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Have there ever been any instances of outsiders having this done?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is a requirement for the process."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But I think religion is a... (clicks tongue) "I would say a crutch to some spaces." (fingers drumming) "(chuckles) I mean, the Dynasty is "so focused on this Luxon, this religion, "and the possibility of what it means, "but it's distracting them from what other good things "they could do with the time and focus, maybe."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And it's selective, right? Not everyone in the Dynasty is consecuted, so there are some that expire in this life and that's the end for them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I "really do not care for the "specific theology behind it, "but I was lucky enough and privileged enough "to be born within a den to where it was not questioned, "but--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So, it's reserved for people within certain families.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, it's expended into those "that aren't part of the dens, "but they don't just consecute anyone "who steps into the Dynasty and requests it."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And you are, forgive me, on your first life?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, I'm nearly the youngest of my den."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, the same for all of us, just a (trails off).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have to be consecuted every single lifetime?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, once you're consecuted, the process continues, yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For thousands of years, you're just there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, until you die too far from a Beacon."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They allow the expansion of our civilization."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If a city "does not exist within some radius of a Beacon, "everyone within that city is unable to return."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And just to follow our thought experiment with our friend Nott here, if she were to be consecuted, she would need to remain here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, you would have to ensure "that if you were to pass away, "it was within the radius of a beacon, yes."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But again, you would-- she would be transferred to a new body and a new, young life, not a current one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, and you would grow and age."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How old are you before you realize you're the same person you were before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You begin to have dreams and visions "of memories of your previous life or lives "and you begin to seek out members of the Dynasty "to then bring you through this anamnesis process "in which you are to combine your current life's memories "with the personality's memories of your previous lives "to become one."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But, like, what's to keep somebody else from coming and say, "Oh, I'm the Queen, I'm the Bright Queen's soul."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, those who would receive her "would then ask many questions that only "the Bright Queen would know the answer to."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you remember your previous life fully?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have not undergone this process myself."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Has anyone, like, an adult been, have you used an adult body before instead of a infant?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think what he's saying is that a new life is born and the soul is within it--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is not of our choosing; "it is the choosing of the Beacon."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And recently, some of those spirits "began to undergo anamnesis there, around Nogvurot "and as such, we helped the children return to the destiny--"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As such have now been "reintroduced into our society."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Under the rare conditions in which "a spirit that has been consecuted were to "die near a Beacon, away from the Dynasty."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's why, do you remember, the criers were going, "Children are being stolen from Nogvurot"?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Stolen from Nogvurot? So they may have just awakened and left.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I wonder how old those children were.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If what you are seeking is some sort of a "transference to a new body, "I don't think that's within my purview."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you just turn this body into a different body?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There are rumors of extremely powerful "polymorph spells and incantations, but even those "have limitations that can be temporary or dispelled.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But if I hear anything, I will let you know."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we hear of something, could we ask your aid?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The rest of this is a distraction."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that pursuit frowned upon or largely ignored? Like a standard is kept and additional knowledge not sought out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's not so much ignored more than "not as much of a priority."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's like not knowing how deep the ocean is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you know how deep the ocean is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I want to dive as deep as I can into that "ocean of the unknown and see what is possible."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you saying, are you saying you want to date Fjord?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think that's what he's saying.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sorry, I was distracted by-- there's cookies.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, and also the ocean talk.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, the ocean, dive deep into the ocean.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He turns back to Caleb and says, "To pursue beyond the limits of "what you're told is capable, to seek the impossible, "to do what every archmage before us has failed to do."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You just have to look long enough and hard enough.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You don't strike me as having much of an appetite for war.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, I have an appetite for knowledge."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Going back to the ocean metaphor, because it's kind of working.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You could also get crushed into oblivion by several tons of weight at the bottom of the ocean or, you know, consumed by some other scary being, like--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you not remotely humbled or afraid of some of the unknowns you might find?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I am as afraid as anybody is facing into the unknown, "but that's what makes it worthwhile, is it not?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Indeed. But you can mitigate the risk."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's actually an interesting train of thought.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How can you mitigate the risk?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Investigating your Luxon and the Beacons, has anyone ever, I don't know, died researching it or perhaps gazed in it too deeply, I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And that is a lesson we all must learn from."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe the lesson is that it's way too much power for any one person to be fucking with.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is possible. But that's why you take care, "and that's why you work alone."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Only because Jester loves the details, what happened to those people that messed around with things sooner than they should have?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There is two tales I can think of off the top of my head "of those that wished to try and "use dunamancy to actually step "into the annals of history, "to step into the time before."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So to answer your question, "there are things that are possible "but if we're careful and we take our time, who knows?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is he? Do I glean, has he made this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He killed his wife with a time machine!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's got some H.G. Wells shit kicking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an insight check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just going based off of his, "That's why you work alone."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I assist her in that? Because I'm feeling that same way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, assist, me and Fjord decide--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I assist her, I assist her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say both you guys, if you guys are both checking, it's both of your, this isn't a skill you necessarily help somebody with for this particular instance.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How cool is it that Matt has a book coming out with all this shit in it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He thinks of this shit and then you get to read this shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, this, all that shit? Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What do you mean someone came back and then they returned to dust? That they came back and then just poof?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This was an assisted ritual and when they returned, "they turned to dust."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know how else to describe it."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, it was but a few moments."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How long, were you able to talk to them when they arrived?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, I wasn't present for this, but I heard about it."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And you've heard of two instances?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But you do not know the result of the other.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, just because we don't know the end of the story does not mean it didn't go on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We met a guy who kind of could control time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was just thinking about that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah, we played in his festival fun house.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But even if that person was gone for just a moment, that doesn't mean that they weren't gone for a very long time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you ever heard of him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Was he the other guy, was he the other story?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you know he eats people or something? He is like, really weird.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, I just know of scattered records "from the previous age."

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You've been a rock for us and that's appreciated.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Should I tell him secrets? I feel like I should tell him secrets.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Perhaps some of my research at some time "might require more hands than those I have myself."

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, or we can use our own hands.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you ever get lonely in your solitude?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think, if I'm answering honestly, I think, but I think I almost became more lonely in my solitude after I became friends with all of them because I realized what having good friends feels like.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What-- "what is it that you with to accomplish, Beauregard?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Feels nice sometimes to be the youngest while people expect little of you and then to prove them wrong."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, the bar was pretty low.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Just hope you can maintain that "bar you raise to your own standards, not theirs."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, well, you always hold yourself to the highest of standards first, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It seems my personal matters from before just have sort of taken a back seat to the grander things on our stage these days.

lines.text: Well, there's Traveler Con coming up, so I'm seeking--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He doesn't know what that is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's seeking a hotel room and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, yeah, we have to find, there's so many preparations we have to make.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you heard of the Traveler?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have heard of it "in the context of your arrival."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think the Traveler would want me to be killed for him, though, right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you feel like doing something funny, he's into it.

lines.text: Well, like, little bad things, not like

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, not like bad things-bad things.

lines.text: What I'm saying is we're having a big convention for everybody that's super into him and we're going to get together and that's happening in a month.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll probably have, like, a party, a dance party, maybe, you know? Maybe a costume contest, I'm not sure.

lines.text: Do you want to go to a volcano?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Traveler Con, I'm a hundred percent down with and I think it's great, but going to Traveler Con is not what you seek, is it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, no, but well, I mean, ultimately, you know, I'm just trying to find, you know, like, where I fit in in the world, ultimately.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is a very, "a very noble mortal cause."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Also, how many babies makes up for a murder?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You take one, you give one, I'm not sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not sure, you know? I haven't actually talked to the Traveler about that because I don't, you know, murder people on a regular basis, but he did give me healing powers because, you know, maybe because we're out doing these kind of things, you know? We fight people so maybe that's why I can heal people.

lines.text: What is the worst thing you've ever done? As far as bad things go.

lines.name: LAURA

lines.text: Yeah, I watched you do it.

lines.text: Yeah, that one was pretty fucked up.

lines.text: But that was badass and totally justified.

lines.text: I mean, he was going to potentially kill us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "anger my father to a point where he "went unprepared into the depths of "Bazzoxan and didn't return."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What'd you do to make him so mad?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And why do you think you're responsible for that? Like, even before you tell us what you did, why do you think you're responsible for your dad not returning?

lines.text: "Yes, and there is an opportunity that he will return."

lines.text: That's got to be odd, raising your parents.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, the more you think about it.

lines.text: Did you say raising your parents?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, if he comes back as a kid.

lines.text: And you know he's your dad but he's also five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not to me yet and I'm "curious to see what that would "be like when or if he returns."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When somebody dies and they're in love with somebody else and then that person gets really old and it's like a 200 year old person, right? And then the other person realizes when they were, like, 15 that, that like, "Oh my god, I loved this person." Do they marry the person when they're adolescent or does it not transfer that sort of emotional feeling? Like, when you're star-crossed lovers for all time or do you, like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It-- ah. These are not matters "I've conjectured too often, but there are individuals "that have relationships that span multiple lifetimes."

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: "But then with each progressive birth "within the radius of the Luxon, "those souls would then be transferred with each new child."

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Our sense is-- and I'm sure that you all have guessed this yourselves, but the Assembly has its plans separate from the King.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, if they have it, "at this moment, I cannot see a path to its retrieval "nor any true benefit in attempting "to blow things up, if you will."

lines.name: LIAM

lines.text: "And you believe that the individuals "that make the laws and employ them across your empire "are more capable than these mages? "Do you not think there is perhaps a necessary balance "between the two that maintains the order?"

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Understand, the Assembly, "and individuals of which I have no sum of, "seem to be dangerous and calculating, "but anyone of such extended study and pursuits, "I can understand far better and see eye to eye with "than I can a power hungry monarch "who came into their seat through bloodline."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I get the sense that they feel they have found the upper hand somehow.

lines.text: "What is the biggest danger to "secret research?" (gentle music)

lines.text: People finding out what you're researching or what you're--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What better way to avoid discovery "than to find a way to stop a conflict "that pries into what you're doing?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What if they drained the other one that they stole?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That would be an astronomical feat based on "the sheer volume of power within each of these Beacons."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That buried one was just sitting there, not absorbing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And often when you are consecuted, "you are given a path to a den."

lines.text: In my research, would I have found anything about Pride's Call that talks about them having some form of reincarnation as part of their culture or city--

lines.text: Hypothetically, if we had one of these potions that they had derived from the Beacon, what would you do with it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (as Essek) "I would study it, top to bottom."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Why, do you have one such thing?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You fucking drop a thing on the Dynasty every time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, he didn't accept your secret.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're giving them up like candy here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't have enough people being nice to us.

lines.text: I have plenty of people being nice to me.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There are (sighs) elements to a solitary life "that sometimes can be more challenging "once you have a basis of comparison."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In all honesty, we do deeply appreciate all the things that you've done for us over these past several months.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, if you ever feel like ditching out here and traveling with us, just let us know, you know? (Essek chuckling)

lines.text: I mean, you know, you said, you said an important part of what you do is staying alone and I think we all felt that too before we met each other.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, "if I can be of help in some way, "perhaps with your predicament as you were requesting--"

lines.name: SAM

lines.text: Was she ugly? Was she pretty?

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm very curious about everything, everything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've been noodling about with something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You just show him now, you just show him now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He might not be able to--

lines.name: SAM

lines.text: Come get in the hot tub.

lines.text: I mean, do you want to see it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It is really great, you will like it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like a bricked-in hole in the ground that we heated with our magic

lines.text: I'm not trying to minimize it.

lines.name: LAURA

lines.text: In your den or when you were growing up-- wait, how many people live here in Xhorhas? Like, thousands, right?

lines.text: Yeah, there was this story he told me.

lines.text: Have I not noticed that you haven't been drinking?

lines.name: TALIESIN
